com.n9mtq4.console.lib
Class BaseConsole

java.lang.Object
  com.n9mtq4.console.lib.BaseConsole
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Console, ConsoleLite, ConsoleNetwork, TextConsole
public class BaseConsole
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The class that handles all User to Listener interactions.

See Also:
Serialized Form

this.addGui(new ThingThatExtendsConsoleGui());

dispose

public void dispose()
Handles closing down the ConsoleListeners and ConsoleGuis.
Note: if overriding make sure to call super to close ConsoleListener and ConsoleGui.

See Also:
ConsoleGui.dispose(), ConsoleListener.onDisable(com.n9mtq4.console.lib.events.DisableActionEvent), ConsoleListener.onRemoval(com.n9mtq4.console.lib.events.RemovalActionEvent)
